answers.author: Pamela Muse
answers.text:
Daniel - contact Tom Guilfoy, Director of Competition, City of Carrollton, TX.  Carrollton has done more with managed compeition -out sourcing than any other city I know. I think you'll find Tom to be a great resource.  His contact info:
Tom Guilfoy
Director of Competition
City of Carrollton, TX
972-466-3015
tguilfoy@cityofcarrollton.com
Good luck,
Pamela Muse
Western Regional Director
Alliance for Innovation
888-468-6450
pmuse@transformgov.org

author: Daniel Schult
text: The City of North Port, Florida is interested in hearing from cities that have contracted for a  study to provide a cost analysis regarding in-house legal services v. outsourced legal services.
title: In-house Legal Services
